content.p: Cookies help us to give you the best experience on our website. You can change your cookie settings if you wish. Otherwise we'll assume you're OK to continue.OKSee our policy Three libraries will be open 24-7 at key times of the year Three libraries will be open 24-hours at key times of the year and during term time: The following libraries will be open 24/7 during Autumn term: The following libraries will be open 24/7 during Spring term: The following libraries will be open 24/7 during Summer term: When our libraries are not open 24-hours there are still spaces that are available for use 24/7. You will need your University Card for entry. Please bring your University Card for access to our libraries. During extended opening hours, we will only be able to provide access to the library via University Card or the MyNottingham app. If you leave the library for a break, please make sure you have the MyNottingham app for re-entry. Here are some of our top tips for making the most of your study time and looking after your wellbeing. King's Meadow Campus Lenton Lane Nottingham, NG7 2NR Please see our Help and support page for telephone and email contact points
